text:
Date Published:2019-08-27 00:00:00      
Outraged students frustrated by the incident said, they and other locals always celebrated their national days at the school's Shaheed Minar The Ramjanpur Technical Academy school Shaheed Minar was vandalized on Monday night in Kalkini upazila, Madaripur. Outraged students frustrated by the incident said, they and other locals always celebrated their national days at the school's Shaheed Minar. Masud and other students of the school said: "We want law enforcement to take prompt action." Headmaster of Ramjanpur Technical Academy Monir Hossain Akon said: "We couldn't identify the miscreants responsible for the  disgraceful act. We filed a General Diary with the police station." Kalkini police station OC Md Mofazzel Hossain confirmed the incident and said: "All necessary action will be taken after the investigation."
